item.title: Why You Might Not Need Vuex With Vue 3
item.description: Vuex is an awesome state management library. It’s simple and integrates well with Vue. Why would anyone leave Vuex?
item.content:encoded: Vuex is an awesome state management library. It’s simple and integrates well with Vue. Why would anyone leave Vuex?

item.title: 6 Ways to Loop Through an Array in JavaScript
item.description: Dealing with arrays is everyday work for every developer. In this article, we are going to see 6 different approaches to how you can iterate through in Javascript.
item.content:encoded: Dealing with arrays is everyday work for every developer. In this article, we are going to see 6 different approaches to how you can iterate through in Javascript.

item.title: 65 Things I wish I knew when I started to Code
item.description: No success story is the same, we all have had our ups and downs in the learning process and things we wish we knew when we started out.
